caption.title: Graphical representation of the most-likely scenario of each set of scenarios describing the dynamics of samples within the native and derived areas using ABC methods.
caption.p: a Analysis 1: Southeast Asia, La RÃ©union and the Mediterranean invasion. b Analysis 2: The North America invasion. c Analysis 3: The South America Invasion. d The South America Invasion. e Analysis 4: Central American Invasion. f The Central Africa invasion.
